name: pasta

A2 a food made from flour, water, and sometimes egg, that is cooked and usually served with a sauce. It is made in various shapes that have different names: Spaghetti, lasagne, ravioli, and cannelloni are all types of pasta.

More examplesFewer examplesSprinkle a tablespoonful of grated cheese over the pasta.Drain the pasta thoroughly.We had slices of cold meat and pasta salad.Serve the pasta hot with a drizzle of olive oil.Straight pasta is very bland - you need some kind of sauce to make it interesting.
